long_description: With moisture-wicking, quick -drying and sun-protective fabric and generous stretch, the REI Rendezvous long-sleeve shirt will keep you comfortable on the trail or while traveling. Polyester/spandex breathes well, is durable and easy to care for; nylon/Lycra(R) spandex panels reduce bulk and lighten the overall feel of the shirt. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh venting at back yoke increases breathability; centered pleats at back yoke enhance mobility. Long sleeves can be rolled up and secured with snap tabs. Center-front snap placket. Shirt has a slim, lean fit with princess seams and a shirttail hem shaped to flatter. The REI Rendezvous shirt has low-profile chest pockets and a hidden zip-secure pocket at the hip.
short_description: With moisture-wicking, quick -drying and sun-protective fabric and generous stretch, the REI Rendezvous long-sleeve shirt will keep you comfortable on the trail or while traveling.
